articles.author: James Waldron
articles.title: HHS gives Moderna $590M to 'accelerate' bird flu vaccine trials - Fierce Biotech
articles.description: The U.S. | The government wants Moderna to push forward with various bird flu vaccines as well as mRNA shots for other influenza strains with pandemic potential.

articles.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra Could Be The Company’s First Smartphone To Ship With An In-House ‘Small Surge’ SoC, But Specification Details Are Currently Kept In The Dark - Wccftech
articles.description: A custom Small Surge chipset could debut with the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, making it the company’s first smartphone to feature the custom silicon
articles.content: A breakthrough could happen later this year as Xiaomi has been reported to introduce its first in-house 3nm chipset that will take on Qualcomms and MediaTeks solutions. The Chinese smartphone maker i… [+2109 chars]
